original_title: Wired Pussy - Caught Smoking While Working
overview: Ashlynn Leigh, caught smoking while working & is sent to Isis Love in order to keep her job! In a city like San Francisco, smoking cigarettes is a crime without comparison. While thieves, murderers and bankers might be taught the error of their ways and rehabilitated, the smoker is a degenerate
title: Wired Pussy - Caught Smoking While Working
